offer_summary.job_description:
This is an engineering leadership role with responsibility for implementing the technology strategy and execution for our digital platforms (e-commerce) that align with our product strategy and meet our business goals.

She/He must exhibit a deep understanding of modern technology stack, agile delivery models, customer experience focus, and the ability to build and maintain strong working relationships. She/He will be required to work collaboratively and lead cross-functional teams while adhering to organizational standards.
requirements:
Partnering with the cross-functional GPC team,
implement the strategy and roadmap for modernizing digital e-commerce platforms
build and execute a roadmap to support build out the new commerce-related capabilities needed for the unified commerce strategy.
deliver and support of platform

Responsible for delivery, support and simplification of current platforms and reduce technical debt and optimal total cost of ownership
work with peer leaders to accelerate agile methodologies across the organization to increase customer-backed problem-solving, pace of solution delivery, innovation, cross-functional collaboration.
Recruit, manage, and motivate a team of engineers to develop best-in-class solutions

Share costs for sports activities,
private medical care,
career insurance,
coffee / tea,
morning coffee/tea breaks,
etc.

Life Insurance
share the commuting costs
extra leave
work in international teams
requierd_skills:
10+ years’ experience working in software development
5+ years of leading technology teams
Proven track record of building technology development teams a must

Experience working across multiple time zones
Broad understanding of IT principles, frameworks and methodologies including TOGAF, Agile, Scrum, DevOps, ITIL with extensive experience planning and managing complex technology projects utilising these methodologies

A Comprehensive understanding of cloud technologies, AWS a must
Proficient in DevOps practices
Experience across Java script frontend technologies, SAP Hybris and Commerce tools
10+ years working in complex eCommerce organisations
Passion for innovation, technology, and digital transformation
Strong leadership capability demonstrated through previous experience leading IT teams, where you have motivated and cultivated a team of professionals

Passionate about eCommerce and Digital solutions
Strong problem-solving skills
Experience with SAP Hybris and Commerce tools
Ability to work collaboratively, adapt, innovate and be innovative
Strong collaboration with stakeholders, cross-functional leaders, peer leaders, peers and peers.
Experience working in software development projects for technology companies
